# Ayora Foods - MERN Stack Food Ordering Application

## Project Overview
Mobile-responsive food ordering system with JWT authentication, admin panel, and customer interface.

## Tech Stack
- MongoDB Atlas (online database)
- Express.js (backend framework)
- React.js with Vite (frontend)
- Node.js (runtime)
- JWT authentication
- Axios (HTTP client)
- Bootstrap (styling)
- React Router (navigation)
- Context API (state management)

## Architecture
- Backend: REST API with JWT auth
- Frontend: React SPA with protected routes
- State: AuthContext + CartContext
- Auth: JWT tokens in localStorage

## Key Features
- Admin: Manage foods, view orders, analytics, daily income
- Customer: Browse foods, cart, place orders, order history
- Mobile-responsive design
- Real-time cart calculations
- Order tracking system
